                                FbDatabase database)
        Initializes AbstractFbTransaction.
        Parameters:
        initialState - Initial transaction state (allowed values are TransactionState.ACTIVE and TransactionState.PREPARED.
        database - FbDatabase that created this handle.

      • getTransactionId

        public long getTransactionId()
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Description copied from interface: FbTransaction
        Retrieves the transaction id.

        The transaction id is the database transaction id, not to be confused with the attachment level transaction handle provided by FbTransaction.getHandle().

        Specified by:
        getTransactionId in interface FbTransaction
        Returns:
        Database transaction id.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
